channel.title: Hello World! DavidSherry/BrandSwell
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
I'm a recent OSU grad in Columbus OH. I pay the bills with [BrandSwell][1] I connect communities with columbusstartups.com I kill Bad Sock Photos with [Death To The Stock Photo][3] I email out weekly Golden Links for startups from my email list, the gold list.
And I tweet too often from @DavidSherry36
Happy to connect about community building, bootstrapping and brand strategy :)
[1]: http://www.brandswell.co [2]: http://www.columbusstartups.com [3]: http://www.deathtothestockphoto.com [4]: http://davidjsherry.com/gold-list/ [5]: http://twitter.com/davidsherry36

item.title: Hello World! DavidSherry/BrandSwell
item.dc:creator: dennisfield
item.description:
David, Nope. But, we have a good bit of people from Columbus on here though. Here’s the background from @ian on why he created this forum.

Welcome bootstrappers! Discussions
Welcome! Let me tell you a story. About 10 years ago Joel Spolsky started a little forum called The Business of Software. It was a great place where people just getting into the software business could ask questions, share ideas, and meet like-minded individuals. In fact, Andrey and I met on those forums and have stayed in touch ever since as our software busineses have grown and evolved. Earlier this year we started the Bootstrapped.fm podcast as a place to share what we've learned, voice o…

Read full topic

Did somebody here in Columbus build this?
